title: Add email and send login information in batch
content: Send your employees their login information by email in batch.Take the opportunity to add your employees' emails to their folders if they haven't already. If you did not enter an email address, you can enter it directly in the Email column.Employees menu, click on Send Credentials by Email,Select the enterprise, or filter by services / department, then click on Search,Select the employees one by one or in batch ,If your employee does not have an email address on his field, fill in the , Click on Save.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
